question: Some one told me to recite "Ya Ali Adrikini Fi Sabililah" for my problems.Can u Please tell me is it right to recite this? Please reply. Thank You.
answer:
QUESTION

Some one told me to recite "Ya Ali Adrikini Fi Sabililah" for my problems.Can u Please tell me is it right to recite this? Please reply. Thank You.

ANSWER


Share:

 

In the name of Allāh, Most Gracious, Most Merciful


Assalāmu ῾alaykum wa Rahmatullāhi Wabarakātuh

 

It is not permissible to call out to the dead for any kind of   help or assistance.[1]
Such an act constitutes kufr and the implications of that are major. If a person is married his marriage terminates. He will have to make tawba and renew his Imaan and Nikah. If he does not do that, his relationship with his wife will be an adulterous one. If his “wife” conceives in that stage and gives birth, the child will be illegitimate. 

 

And Allāh Ta῾āla Knows Best
Wassalāmu ῾alaykum 

 

Ml. Luqman Hansrot,
Student Dārul Iftā

Checked and Approved by:
Mufti Ebrahim Desai
Dārul Iftā




[1] وَمَنْ أَضَلُّ مِمَّنْ يَدْعُو مِنْ دُونِ اللَّهِ مَنْ لا يَسْتَجِيبُ لَهُ إِلَى يَوْمِ الْقِيَامَةِ وَهُمْ عَنْ دُعَائِهِمْ غَافِلُونَ .(قران الكريم ,سورة الاحقاف , 5)
2 وَلا تَدْعُ مِنْ دُونِ اللَّهِ مَا لا يَنْفَعُكَ وَلا يَضُرُّكَ فَإِنْ فَعَلْتَ فَإِنَّكَ إِذاً مِنَ الظَّالِمِينَ . (قران الكريم ,سورة يونس , 106)
3 ويكفر بقوله أرواح المشايخ حاضرة تعلم ...(مجمع الأنهر في شرح ملتقى الأبحر , باب الرد , رشيديه ,ج 1 , ص 209)
(فتاوى محموديه ,جامعه فاروقيه , ج 1 , ص 350 )
